div.p: [In the consulship of our lords] Valentinian and Valens eternal Augusti and consuls for the third time --- vac. --- --- the aids that were sent to you immediately with the things discussed --- we think it right to ask that your majesty order the previous pronoetes of our --- of our property since there is some talk going around contrary to the opinion --- your majesty also earlier. vac. --- produced your. He responded that the same --- of the staff member.
